relation: Creates the specified controller by using the specified request context.
Retrieves the controller instance for the specified request context and controller type.
Retrieves the controller type for the specified name and request context.

This method calls the GetControllerSessionBehavior method. Top Remarks This class provides a convenient base class for developers who want to make only minor changes to controller creation. This class calls the Dispose method for any controller that implements the IDisposable interface. Thread Safety Any public static ( Shared in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.
